reviews.reviewText: “There's a feeling of structure that you can't find in other templates — Stack has become my default template.”
“Variant has been a massive plus for my workflow — I can now get live mockups out in a matter of hours, my clients really love it.”
“We’ve been using Stack to prototype designs quickly and efficiently. Needless to say we’re hugely impressed by the style and value.”

features.title: About the Product
features.description: Combine blocks from a range of categories to build pages that are rich in visual style and interactivity.

banner.label: Hot!
banner.description: Over 290 interface blocks, 140 demo pages and Variant Page Builder. Purchase Stack for $18 USD.

callout.centralText: Start using that in your next camping trips

questionsPart1.title: How do refunds work?
questionsPart1.answer: Open a refund request with us and we can work with you to resolve it ASAP.

questionsPart1.title: Can I pay using AMEX?
questionsPart1.answer: Yes, we accept all major credit cards, including AMEX, so rack up those points!

questionsPart1.title: Is there a bulk-buy discount?
questionsPart1.answer: We have corporate and enterprise arrangements that our pricing team can assist with on a case-by-case basis. Contact Us for info.

questionsPart2.title: Is there a minimum contract term?
questionsPart2.answer: No! The beauty of our service is that you can cancel anytime you need to — no questions asked.

questionsPart2.title: Do I need an SSL certificate?
questionsPart2.answer: This depends on whether your plan to process the payment on your site or not. We recommend using a third-party provider to unburden yourself.
